The autoguns came to life blazing in all directions, a blast zipped past
Phobias head. "This is crazy"He thought "Predacons fighting Predacons when
both groups should be firing at Maximals."

"Ok, only one thing left to do, Phobia to computer, redirect message." he
knew redirecting his message would make it harder to get a lock on his
position.

"Predacon ship this is Phobia I have been tricked by Megatron, my intentions
were to join your group, not his." He hesitated for a moment "Please
respond.


----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 02, 2000 1:26 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>     Black Aracnia enters the bridge from her chambers, where she was
> snoozing, to find the ships systems down. She cursed when she saw no one
> attempting to fix them.
>     "Computer, bring all systems online." Aracnia said, taking a seat in
the
> command chair.
>     "Unable to respond. Invaders have tampered with schedual and procedure
> protocols." The computer chirped.
>     Black Aracnia paused for a moment, and then opened a compartment on
the
> arm of the command chair. Hell Beast left disks on the numerous functions
of
> the ship, and tips on what to do in emergency. Aracnia went through them
> quickly until she found the system diagnostic. It would get the computer
back
> up and running.
>     She inserted the disk and it went to work quickly. The stillness of
the
> bridge was filled with the hum of the computers and mainframe coming
online.
> Black Aracnia smiled, leaned back in the chair, and was now going to take
> care of the invaders.
>
>     Adrax fired his gappling gun at Terrorsaur, and sent two optic blasts
at
> Kitkat. He manuvered around the sky,trying to hit as many targets as he
could.
>
>     Black Aracnia, while looking at the computer monitors, " Computer,
bring
> all Autoguns online, and initiate the shiled at Maximum Power."
>     The computer did so, and within a moment the Autoguns flew to life,
> shooting at Megatrons group, as well as Adrax and Autofire who they didnt
> reconize as Predacons.
>     "Excellent. Now, for the intruders inside...."She said, bringing over
a
> keyboard and an interactive map of the ship.
>     She began to type in codes for various sections of the ships internal
> defences. She spotted the two intruders and sent the internal defences on
> them. The corriodr they were in snapped shut, the ventilation system
hissed
> closed, and several small canon extend from the ceiling. Black Aracnia
smiled
> because they had just walked into there own tomb.
>     "Computer, close hatch and lock down the entire ship. I dont want
anyone
> else getting in."
>     The computer did so. All the doors on the ship closed. The shafts for
air
> snapped shut, and all the canon extended and prepared to fire. And, for a
> last fitch effort in case anyone somehow got though, Black Aracnia orders
a
> force seven sheilding on all doors and corridor entrances, including the
> hatch. The ship was inpenetrable all thanks to Black Aracnia....who was
> thinking of who should be in charge of the fraction.
>
> 
>
>
>
